QuestData.Title: Straight to the Heart
QuestData.Description:
The success of Mor'Bitan's treachery has made him complacent.
Let him enjoy the feeling, for it ends here. We will lure him out with this ritual... and we will avenge my margrave.
Stand with me now, $n. Together, we will make an example of this traitor.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A dangerous lich from the House of Rituals who assisted in the destruction of the House of Eyes.
QuestData.RewardText: Cursed lich--may his soul never be reborn.
